messageBody:
> When I run my test suite I found that each test stops running after the
> first failed assertion. I have a number of assertions in each test and I
> would like to know every assertion that is broken. I have tried to
> create a default TestResult inside each test using,
...
> Is there any way I can get JUnit to show all broken assertions for each
> test and not move onto the next test when the first assertion fails?
the way to do it is have several seperate tests...
the latter tests must obviously repeat some of the work done by earlier tests, since the objects are built from scratch

e.g.

test1() {
        doSomethinng();
        assert( getExpectedResultFromDoSomething() )
}

test1() {
        doSomthinng();
        doSomethingElse();
        assert( getExpectedResultFromDoSomethingElse() )
}
